practitioners.name: Vanita Achar
practitioners.title: Registered Dietitian
practitioners.details: Specialities: Vegetarian and Vegan Diets, Healthy Eating, Diabetes
practitioners.comments: "Vanita was a great nutritionist and knowledgeable on the subjects I had questions on, like superfoods, keto diet, and how to improve bad diet habits"

practitioners.name: Maya Friedman
practitioners.title: Registered Dietitian
practitioners.details: Specialities: Meal Planning,  Eating Disorders, Weight Management
practitioners.comments: "Maya is absolutely awesome! She provided me some great tips to clarify my diet and is incredibly personable. Highly recommended!"

practitioners.name: Randi Komisar
practitioners.title: Registered Dietitian
practitioners.details: Specialties: Healthy Dieting, Digestive Health, Gluten-Free
practitioners.comments: "As someone who has seen therapists and nutrition specialists before, Randi quickly gave me a few tools that will help me manage emotional eating in the future. I’ll definitely book with her again!"

practitioners.name: Jean-Jeffrey Marcellus
practitioners.title: Nurse Practitioner
practitioners.details: Specialties: Eczema, Preventative Health, Relaxation Techniques
practitioners.comments: "Able to speak directly to the very specific questions I threw at him and offered some suggestions that were asides from health issues I wanted to discuss but were relevant. Very friendly and able to accommodate last minute booking."

practitioners.name: Karen Doll
practitioners.title: Nurse Practitioner
practitioners.details: Specialities: Sinus infections, High Blood Pressure, Sore Throat
practitioners.comments: "Awesome appointment! She made me feel so much better, it felt like a conversation instead of a doctors appointment. Extremely understanding of what I was experiencing and knowledgeable of how to resolve the issues! Thank you soooo much."

practitioners.name: Asefeh Faraz
practitioners.title: Doctor of Nursing
practitioners.details: Specialities: Acne, Preventative Health, Bacterial and Viral Infections
practitioners.comments: "Asefah was lovely and took the time to listen to and address all of my concerns. Will definitely see her again!"

practitioners.name: Marianna Strongin
practitioners.title: Doctor of Psychology
practitioners.details: Specialities: Emotional Well-Being, Stress Management, Eating Disorders
practitioners.comments: "Dr. Strongin was able to pull together so much and ask great questions that helped me think critically about everything I had spoken to her about and even the deeper issues I had told her about."

practitioners.name: Elizabeth Chang
practitioners.title: Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner
practitioners.details: Specializes in: Relaxation techniques, mood and anxiety disorders, and substance abuse
practitioners.comments: "Elizabeth didn't just sit there, as I have experienced in other talk therapy visits. She engages in conversation, asks questions that make me dig a little deeper, and then offers feedback. I will definitely schedule with her again. She made me feel very comfortable and free of judgement."

practitioners.name: Bridget Cross
practitioners.title: Licensed Clinical Social Worker
practitioners.details: Specialties: Couples/Relationships, Depression/Anxiety, Sexuality
practitioners.comments: "This session was very helpful, and I felt very comfortable.  I am really pleased that we were able to come up with some concrete ideas and strategies."

practitioners.name: Rebecca Callahan
practitioners.title: Women’s Health Nurse Practitioner
practitioners.details: Specialties: Holistic Health, Birth control, STIs/HIV
practitioners.comments: "I appreciated how she recommended holistic options (acupuncture/yoga) as well as traditional options. Very professional. Great experience."

practitioners.name: Justine Groake
practitioners.title: Women’s Health Nurse Practitioner
practitioners.details: Specialties: Bladder issues, periods, pelvic pain"
practitioners.comments: "So easy and efficient. Heard what I needed in less than 10 mins. Would have hated to have gone out in the rain and waited for an hour at a clinic just to ask a question about my skin allergy."

practitioners.name: Corinne Menn
practitioners.title: OB/GYN
practitioners.details: Specialties: Yeast infections, Acne, Irregular Periods
practitioners.comments: "Dr. Menn was fantastic! She was easy to talk to, addressed my needs and questions, was kind, punctual, and exceeded all of my expectations. Thank you Dr. Menn!"

practitioners.title: Nurse Practitioner

practitioners.comments: "Karen was really great and helpful and informative. She answered all my questions in a concise manner and made the process of seeing a healthcare provider very easy! I would definitely see her again and feel comfortable in doing so."

practitioners.title: Doctor of Nursing

practitioners.details: Specialities: Emotional Well-Being, Stress Management, Eating Disorders
practitioners.comments: "Marianna was sharp, yet considerate and empathetic. She was quick to identify the problem areas and articulated them in such a way that gave me my aha! She challenged my excuses and had a considered viewpoint without being judgmental. She had the tools to help work through issues. Marianna is a game changer!"
